movie_title: The big names are ready. Watch #SuperBowlLVIII tonight on CBS, Paramount+ & Nickelodeon #SBLVIII
introduction: Paramount+ is here! Stream Key & Peele now on Paramount+. Try it FREE at https://bit.ly/3qyOeOf
lead_intro: Join the fun and test your comprehension with this entertaining rap transcript!

quiz.question: Who wraps up rushers like aluminum foil?
quiz.explanation: In the rap, it is mentioned that T King wraps up rushers like aluminum foil.

quiz.question: Who loves the ball so much they want to marry it?
quiz.explanation: Ibraim Mo expresses his love for the ball in the rap by saying he wants to marry it.

quiz.question: Who is known for clean rhymes like Dr SE po?
quiz.explanation: Ibraim Mo is compared to Dr SE po for having clean rhymes in the rap.

quiz.question: Who can intercept balls with their ear according to the rap?
quiz.explanation: Dr SE po is mentioned in the rap as being able to intercept balls with their ear.

quiz.question: Who plays guitar in the rap?
quiz.explanation: Demarcus is stated to play guitar in the rap.
